item.title: v2ray

item.title: FlashMethods

item.title: KaliRpi
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 0. img下载地址 登陆用户密码： kali, kali; 1. 镜像源地址 kali@kali:~$ sudo vi /etc/apt/sources.list #阿里云镜像 deb https://mirrors.aliyun.com/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib deb-src https://mirrors.aliyun.com/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib #中科大 deb http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib deb-src http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib #浙大 deb http://mirrors.zju.edu.cn/kali kali-rolling main contrib non-free
